name: acine-proto-dist-py
description: protobuf generation script for acine python

scripts.build:nix: echo NOT WORKING; exit; . .venv\bin\activate && protol --create-package --in-place -o acine_proto_dist protoc -p ../../src --python_out=acine_proto_dist --grpc_python_out=acine_proto_dist --mypy_out=acine_proto_dist ../../src/*.proto

author: NovaSagittarii
